Header.name: I'M Avinash Jha
Header.header_para: Self-Taught Developer. Tech Enthusiast. Avid Reader.

About.paragraph: I am a self-taught developer with a passion for creativity in web and mobile development. Over the years, I have successfully completed more than 10 projects, demonstrating my ability to deliver high-quality solutions. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to learn and integrate new technologies.
